mapper.select: select LIUN_NM,EQPM_OPRT_STTS_VAL from TB_PR_1100MT WHERE EQPM_OPRT_STTS_VAL = 'Y'

SELECT NVL(SUM(PROD_QNTT), 0) AS TOTAL_PROD_QNTT_SSG FROM TB_PR_1100MT WHERE ITEM_NM = '싹싹지우개' AND PROD_END_YN = 'Y' AND PROD_END_TIME IS NOT NULL AND TRUNC(TO_DATE(PROD_END_TIME, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS')) =TRUNC(SYSDATE)

SELECT NVL(SUM(PROD_QNTT), 0) AS TOTAL_PROD_QNTT_HH FROM TB_PR_1100MT WHERE ITEM_NM = '하츄핑지우개' AND PROD_END_YN = 'Y' AND PROD_END_TIME IS NOT NULL AND TRUNC(TO_DATE(PROD_END_TIME, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS')) =TRUNC(SYSDATE)

SELECT NVL(SUM(PROD_QNTT), 0) AS TOTAL_PROD_QNTT_SSG FROM TB_PR_1100MT WHERE ITEM_NM = '싹싹지우개' AND PROD_END_YN = 'Y' AND PROD_END_TIME IS NOT NULL AND TRUNC(TO_DATE(PROD_END_TIME, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS')) BETWEEN TRUNC(SYSDATE - 6) AND TRUNC(SYSDATE)

SELECT NVL(SUM(PROD_QNTT), 0) AS TOTAL_PROD_QNTT_HH FROM TB_PR_1100MT WHERE ITEM_NM = '하츄핑지우개' AND PROD_END_YN = 'Y' AND PROD_END_TIME IS NOT NULL AND TRUNC(TO_DATE(PROD_END_TIME, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS')) BETWEEN TRUNC(SYSDATE - 6) AND TRUNC(SYSDATE)

SELECT NVL(SUM(PROD_QNTT), 0) AS TOTAL_PROD_QNTT_SSG FROM TB_PR_1100MT WHERE ITEM_NM = '싹싹지우개' AND PROD_END_YN = 'Y' AND PROD_END_TIME IS NOT NULL AND TRUNC(TO_DATE(PROD_END_TIME, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS')) BETWEEN TRUNC(SYSDATE - 30) AND TRUNC(SYSDATE)

SELECT NVL(SUM(PROD_QNTT), 0) AS TOTAL_PROD_QNTT_HH FROM TB_PR_1100MT WHERE ITEM_NM = '하츄핑지우개' AND PROD_END_YN = 'Y' AND PROD_END_TIME IS NOT NULL AND TRUNC(TO_DATE(PROD_END_TIME, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS')) BETWEEN TRUNC(SYSDATE - 30) AND TRUNC(SYSDATE)

SELECT NVL(SUM(INDC_QNTT), 0) AS TOTAL_PROD_QNTT FROM TB_PR_1100MT WHERE PROD_END_YN = 'Y' AND PROD_END_TIME IS NOT NULL AND TRUNC(TO_DATE(PROD_END_TIME, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS')) BETWEEN TRUNC(SYSDATE -30) AND TRUNC(SYSDATE)

SELECT NVL(SUM(PROD_QNTT), 0) AS TOTAL_PROD_QNTT FROM TB_PR_1100MT WHERE PROD_END_YN = 'Y' AND PROD_END_TIME IS NOT NULL AND TRUNC(TO_DATE(PROD_END_TIME, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS')) BETWEEN TRUNC(SYSDATE -30) AND TRUNC(SYSDATE)

SELECT NVL(SUM(PROD_QNTT), 0) AS TOTAL_PROD_QNTT, NVL(SUM(DFC_RT), 0) AS TOTAL_DFC_RT, ROUND( CASE WHEN NVL(SUM(PROD_QNTT), 0) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE (NVL(SUM(DFC_RT), 0) / NVL(SUM(PROD_QNTT), 0)) * 100 END, 2 ) AS DEFECT_RATE FROM TB_PR_1100MT WHERE PROD_END_YN = 'Y' AND PROD_END_TIME IS NOT NULL AND TRUNC(TO_DATE(PROD_END_TIME, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS')) BETWEEN TRUNC(SYSDATE - 30) AND TRUNC(SYSDATE)

SELECT NVL(SUM(PROD_QNTT), 0) AS TOTAL_PROD_QNTT, NVL(SUM(DFC_RT), 0) AS TOTAL_DFC_RT, ROUND( CASE WHEN NVL(SUM(PROD_QNTT), 0) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE (NVL(SUM(DFC_RT), 0) / NVL(SUM(PROD_QNTT), 0)) * 100 END, 2 ) AS DEFECT_RATE FROM TB_PR_1100MT WHERE LIUN_NM = 'A라인1호기' AND PROD_END_YN = 'Y' AND PROD_END_TIME IS NOT NULL AND TRUNC(TO_DATE(PROD_END_TIME, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS')) BETWEEN TRUNC(SYSDATE - 30) AND TRUNC(SYSDATE)
